articles.title: Baby Yoda can live on your desk thanks to AR and Google Search - The Verge
articles.description: Google has added Baby Yoda to its AR search results in the Google app. The Star Wars character is accessible with a search of “Grogu”, “The Child”, or “Baby Yoda.” Google last added more creatures to its AR search results last week.
articles.content:

articles.description: Actor who wore the Mandalorian armor in Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi dies from health complications including Parkinson's disease
articles.content:
